ApplicationConfirmationView.Text: Make a note of the process number. This is necessary in order to be able to view the status of your application at a later date.

ApplicationInfoBox.Heading: Information
ApplicationInfoBox.BasicExplanation: Select the course of Leipzig University which you would like to have credits transferred. Then enter the details of the modules you like to have credited. You can add as many module assignments as you need.

ModuleAssignment.Heading: Module Assignment
ModuleAssignment.0: Modules earned at other universities you like to have credited as modules of Leipzig University.
ModuleAssignment.1: Only specifically related modules should be written in a single module assignment.
ModuleAssignment.2: You can add multiple module assignments for the entire application.

ExternalModules.Heading: Modules to be credited
ExternalModules.0: Enter one or more module(s) completed at another university.
ExternalModules.1: The given fields must be filled in.
ExternalModules.2: Enter the credit system (ECTS or other).
ExternalModules.3: A PDF file with the official description of the individual module must be uploaded as the module description.

ModulesLeipzig.Heading: Modules of Leipzig University
ModulesLeipzig.0: Select one or more module(s) for which you would like to have credits transferred.
ModulesLeipzig.1: If you cannot find a suitable module, you also have the option of not selecting one.

Comment.Heading: Comment
Comment.0: Further information on this module assignment can be entered here, this is optional.

ModuleAssignment.Heading: Module Assignment
ModuleAssignment.ModulesLeipzig: Algorithmen und Datenstrukturen 1, Algorithmen und Datenstrukturen 2

ExternalModules.Heading: Modules to be credited
ExternalModules.3: Course 'Software Engineering and Management Bachelor's Programme'
ExternalModules.4: Module Description: pdf-document with the description of Data Structures and Algorithms module

ErrorViewIndexjs.NoAccesContent: You do not have permission to view this page.
ErrorViewIndexjs.ServerUnreachableContent: The server is currently unreachable. Please try again later.
ErrorViewIndexjs.SiteNotFoundContent: The requested page does not exist.
ErrorViewIndexjs.SomethingWentWrongContent: There was an unhandled error. Please try again. If the error persists, please contact the administrators.

FinishedInfoBox.Heading: What's Next?
FinishedInfoBox.Text: A final decision has been made on your application. This is only information about the possibility of recognition. To officially have your credits recognized, you must go to the study office. Please bring all relevant documents that prove the completion of the credits to be recognized. If you have further questions about your application, please contact the study office.

FormalRejectionInfoBox.Heading: Formal rejection
FormalRejectionInfoBox.Text: Your application was rejected due to formal rejections. The module assignments containing formal rejections are marked in red. In the module assignment, you will find an explanation of the specific error at the bottom. Please correct all indicated errors. Then you can resubmit your application.

Application.Heading: Submit Application
Application.Text: Have credits, you earned at other universities, credited for modules at Leipzig University. This is useful, for example, if you are transferring from another university to Leipzig University, returning after a semester abroad, or taking courses concurrently at another university.

Status.AriaProcessNumber: process number of the application to be Accessed
Status.Heading: View Status
Status.Text: Enter the 6-digit process number, provided to you when you submitted the application, to view the status. Alternatively you can find this process number in the overview PDF of your application.

LoginView.Heading: Login
LoginView.InvalidData: Invalid login data. Please try again

PanelExternalModulesItem.CreditPointsEmpty: Points must be specified as a number

PanelInternalModules.NoModulesSelected: No modules of Leipzig University are selected.

SideInfoApplicationProcess.GoToStudy: Once the application is completed, go to the study office with all relevant documents

SideInfoStudyOffice.Faculty: Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science
SideInfoStudyOffice.OfficeHourTimes: Tuesday and Thursday: 9:00 am - 11:30 am and 12:30 pm - 4:00 pm

Popup.Heading: Have you corrected all formal errors?
Popup.Text: After resubmitting the application, you will no longer be able to edit it.

StatusPanel.NotYetDecided: No decision has been made yet
